title: Should She Chase After A Man Who Ghosted Her?
description:
For the last month, she's been dating a guy she met online. Two talked every day up until a week ago. He invited her to an event but days before ghosted her! She hasn't heard from him since and wants to reach out for answers. Should she or should she let him go?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
